title: panic/crash in windows7, 64 bit.
body:

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?
panic while trying to copy 3 gb drive contents.  Issue continues to happen after a retries.  


#### What is your rclone version (eg output from `rclone -V`)
v1.42 (reproduceable in 1.39)

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
win7, 64 bit

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
google drive

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
"./rclone.exe" "--config" "rclone.conf" "-vv" "--transfers=16" "--checkers=32" "copy" "--drive-upload-cutoff=32M" "--drive-chunk-size=32M" "g:\\" "google_drive_encrypted:/j1/2018/mybook/" "--log-file=mybook.txt"

(i tried sizes of 64M, 128M and same issues)
